text: I di hai o di bida gahu wae dela ma gaa tai i tuaidina o tangada, dela gadoo dogu hiihai bolo digau Israel mo Judah gi kumudia Au gi mau dangihi. Au ne hai di mee deenei bolo digaula gii hai nia daangada ni aagu, gaa hidi ai di hagaamu mo di hagalaamua ang gi dogu ingoo, gei digaula hagalee hagalongo mai gi di Au.”
